instruction: Generate a web page about the history of slavery in America
output: The history of slavery in America is a long and complex one that spans centuries and locations in the United States. Slavery was established in the British colonies in 1619 and existed throughout the American Revolution and Civil War. Due to the influx of international trade and immigration, the practice experienced a revival in the 19th century, and eventually led to the abolishment of slavery before the end of the Civil War. Although the legal status of slavery has long since been terminated, its impacts remain in American culture and continue to shape the country today. On this page, you will find a comprehensive overview of the practice of American slavery, its legal status, and its influence on modern American society.
